item.title: Notes on Effective Programming Practice
item.description: Slides Example Process of A Project Shell Reference Basics Pipeline TeX Git Reference Basics Escape Vim Late .gitignore Multiple Branches Tagging Collaboration (Ana)Conda Reference Setup for Zsh Create & Delete Environment Kernels Use Sublime with SendCode Python Waf Reference Config Build Miscellaneous Note: I use macOS Catalina with Zsh (Oh-My-Zsh) and Sublime Text 3. Please use Google to tailor your own version.

item.title: Introduction to Python 3
